title: Spot Report by the OSCE Special Monitoring Mission to Ukraine (SMM): Shelling at and around ...
text: ( Source : OSCE - Organization for Security and Co-operation in Europe ) At 14:55hrs on 10 October at the Joint Centre for Control and Co-ordination ( JCCC ) observation post at the ' Donetsk People's Republic ' (' DPR ')-controlled Donetsk railway
